title: African village life: fishing on the Niger River
creator_credit: Hermann Schlenker, Julien Bryan and International Film Foundation
brief_description: Shows how Bozo tribesmen in Mali, West Africa, obtain one of their most important food staples from the Niger River, using the most primitive kind of equipment. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
